text: Anjan Das (13 June 1951 - 2 June 2014) was an Indian movie director. His movies were in the Bengali language. His best known movie was Faltu (2006). He won a National Film Award in the Best Feature Film category. Das died from colon cancer on 2 June 2014, aged 62. His wife and son outlived him. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1951 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in India Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Indian movie directors
title: Anjan Das
